DOC.brief_summary: This study assess short long term effect group-based mindfulness programme ( Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction , MBSR ) first year medical psychology student Universities Oslo Tromso . The primary outcome variable mental distress , student stress subsequent work stress , subjective wellbeing , empathy , mindfulness spirituality . The investigator also study explanatory moderator mediator variable . The study two-centre randomize control study involve 288 medical psychology student University Oslo University Tromso . The sample size calculation base reduction mental distress perceive medical/psychology school stress 20 % intervention group . The control group receive intervention . After initial seven week course ( take place 2009 2010 ) intervention group receive follow-up session 1.5 hour twice year throughout study course 5-6 year . The follow-up period last 1 year graduation Oslo cohort 3 year graduation Tromso cohort .
DOC.criteria: All student term 3 medical psychology study University Oslo autumn 2009 , spring 2010 . All student term 3 medical psychology study University Tromso autumn 2010 , autumn 2011 .
